languages.text: {n}Сервопротоколы в кибермастифе, похоже, претерпели значительные изменения: на протяжении всей тренировки {petname} проявляет максимальную агрессию и ярость. Зверь рвет в клочья все, что вы кидаете ему, однако этого мало: видно, что кибермастиф жаждет крови. Настоящей крови.{/n}

{n}The cyber-mastiff's servo-protocols have undergone a few notable changes. Throughout the training session, the beast repeatedly displays extreme aggression and ferocity, as it shreds anything you throw yet seems to remain unsatisfied. {petname} hungers for blood. Real blood.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сервопротоколы в кибермастифе, похоже, претерпели значительные изменения: на протяжении всей тренировки {petname} проявляет максимальную агрессию и ярость. Зверь рвет в клочья все, что вы кидаете ему, однако этого мало: видно, что кибермастиф жаждет крови. Настоящей крови.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff's servo-protocols have undergone notable changes: throughout the training session, it displays extreme aggression and ferocity. The beast shreds anything you throw at it but does not seem satisfied. {petname} hungers for blood. Real blood.{/n}

{n}The cyber-mastiff's servo-protocols have undergone notable changes: throughout the training session, it displays extreme aggression and ferocity. The beast shreds anything you throw at it but does not seem satisfied. {petname} hungers for blood. Real blood.{/n}

{n}The cyber-mastiff's servo-protocols have undergone a few notable changes. Throughout the training session, the beast repeatedly displays extreme aggression and ferocity, as it shreds anything you throw yet seems to remain unsatisfied. {petname} hungers for blood. Real blood.{/n}

{n}The cyber-mastiff's servo-protocols have undergone a few notable changes. Throughout the training session, the beast repeatedly displays extreme aggression and ferocity, as it shreds anything you throw yet seems to remain unsatisfied. {petname} hungers for blood. Real blood.{/n}

{n}The cyber-mastiff's servo-protocols have undergone a few notable changes. Throughout the training session, the beast repeatedly displays extreme aggression and ferocity, as it shreds anything you throw yet seems to remain unsatisfied. {petname} hungers for blood. Real blood.{/n}

{n}The cyber-mastiff's servo-protocols have undergone a few notable changes. Throughout the training session, the beast repeatedly displays extreme aggression and ferocity, as it shreds anything you throw yet seems to remain unsatisfied. {petname} hungers for blood. Real blood.{/n}

languages.text: {n}サイバーマスチフのサーボプロトコルに、いくつか目立った変化が見られるようになった。訓練の間、獣は何度も激しい攻撃性と獰猛さを見せつけ、あなたが投げるものを次々に引き裂きながらも、満足していないように見えた。{petname}は血に飢えていた。本物の血に。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff's servo-protocols have undergone a few notable changes. Throughout the training session, the beast repeatedly displays extreme aggression and ferocity, as it shreds anything you throw yet seems to remain unsatisfied. {petname} hungers for blood. Real blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}サイバーマスチフのサーボプロトコルに、いくつか目立った変化が見られるようになった。訓練の間、獣は何度も激しい攻撃性と獰猛さを見せつけ、あなたが投げるものを次々に引き裂きながらも、満足していないように見えた。{petname}は血に飢えていた。本物の血に。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Servoprotokolle des Cyber-Mastiff weisen einige bemerkbare Veränderungen auf. Während des Trainings zeigt das Tier wiederholt extreme Aggression und Wildheit. Es zerfetzt alles, was du wirfst, wirkt dabei aber unzufrieden. {petname} will Blut. Echtes Blut.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff's servo-protocols have undergone a few notable changes. Throughout the training session, the beast repeatedly displays extreme aggression and ferocity, as it shreds anything you throw yet seems to remain unsatisfied. {petname} hungers for blood. Real blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Servoprotokolle des Cyber-Mastiff weisen einige bemerkbare Veränderungen auf. Während des Trainings zeigt das Tier wiederholt extreme Aggression und Wildheit. Es zerfetzt alles, was du wirfst, wirkt dabei aber unzufrieden. {petname} will Blut. Echtes Blut.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les servo-protocoles du cyber-mastiff semblent avoir subi quelques changements notables. Tout au long de votre séance d'entraînement, la créature affiche un comportement extrêmement agressif, réduisant en charpie tout objet que vous lui lancez sans pour autant afficher la moindre once de satisfaction. {petname} a soif de sang. De sang frais.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff's servo-protocols have undergone a few notable changes. Throughout the training session, the beast repeatedly displays extreme aggression and ferocity, as it shreds anything you throw yet seems to remain unsatisfied. {petname} hungers for blood. Real blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les servo-protocoles du cyber-mastiff semblent avoir subi quelques changements notables. Tout au long de votre séance d'entraînement, la créature affiche un comportement extrêmement agressif, réduisant en charpie tout objet que vous lui lancez sans pour autant afficher la moindre once de satisfaction. {petname} a soif de sang. De sang frais.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los servoprotocolos de {petname} han experimentado varios cambios apreciables. Durante el transcurso de la sesión de entrenamiento, la bestia ha exhibido una agresividad y ferocidad extremas en repetidas ocasiones, haciendo trizas todo lo que le arrojas sin quedar nunca satisfecha. {petname} tiene sed de sangre. Sangre auténtica.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff's servo-protocols have undergone a few notable changes. Throughout the training session, the beast repeatedly displays extreme aggression and ferocity, as it shreds anything you throw yet seems to remain unsatisfied. {petname} hungers for blood. Real blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los servoprotocolos de {petname} han experimentado varios cambios apreciables. Durante el transcurso de la sesión de entrenamiento, la bestia ha exhibido una agresividad y ferocidad extremas en repetidas ocasiones, haciendo trizas todo lo que le arrojas sin quedar nunca satisfecha. {petname} tiene sed de sangre. Sangre auténtica.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这只生化獒犬的伺服协议出现了几处明显变化。在整个训练过程中，你的生化獒犬都表现出了极端强烈的攻击性与野性。它撕碎了你丢出去的所有东西，但看起来依然不太满足。{petname}渴望着鲜血，真正的鲜血。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff's servo-protocols have undergone a few notable changes. Throughout the training session, the beast repeatedly displays extreme aggression and ferocity, as it shreds anything you throw yet seems to remain unsatisfied. {petname} hungers for blood. Real blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这只生化獒犬的伺服协议出现了几处明显变化。在整个训练过程中，你的生化獒犬都表现出了极端强烈的攻击性与野性。它撕碎了你丢出去的所有东西，但看起来依然不太满足。{petname}渴望着鲜血，真正的鲜血。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Siber mastifin hizmoprotokolleri birkaç değişiklik geçirmiş. Eğitim esnasında yaratık aşırı agresif ve vahşi davranıyor. Ona fırlattıklarını parçalasa da tatmin olmuyor gibi. {petname} kana susamış. Gerçek kana...{/n}

Throughout the training session, the beast repeatedly displays extreme aggression and ferocity, as it shreds anything you throw yet seems to remain unsatisfied. {petname} hungers for blood. Real blood.{/n}
